mapper.sql: id, mobile, email, updateTime, status, enterpriseName, companyBusinessLicenseImg, personRealName, nickname, personCompanyType, personIdentifyCard, personIDFrontImgUrl, personIDBackImgUrl, reason
mapper.select: SELECT rc.*, ic.enterpriseName, ic.identify, date_format(ic.enterpriseCreaterTime,'%Y-%m-%d') enterpriseCreaterTime, ic.registerCapital, ic.currency, ic.province, ic.city, ic.area, ic.address, ic.saleProductDesc FROM t_m_member_real_check rc, t_m_member_info_check ic WHERE ic.id = rc.id AND rc.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_m_member_real_check (id, mobile, email, updateTime, status, enterpriseName, companyBusinessLicenseImg, personRealName, nickname, personCompanyType, personIdentifyCard, personIDFrontImgUrl, personIDBackImgUrl, reason) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyBusinessLicenseImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personCompanyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personIdentifyCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personIDFrontImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personIDBackImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update t_m_member_real_check
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
